import React from "react"; import {Link, useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import CatalogShoes from '../Card/Catalog_cards' const Item_catalog = () => { const {id} = useParams(); const selectedItem = CatalogShoes.find((item) => item.id === parseInt(id)); const goBack = () => { history.goBack(); } return (

{selectedItem.title}

{selectedItem.text}

Countable field

Selectable field

{selectedItem.text1}

{selectedItem.price}

) } export default Item_catalog;
